Online Shopping Manager v2.0 - README

Online Shopping Manager is a tool to aid in managing one's online shopping. It is a web interface that manages the dates of purchases along with their other details and helps find orders which were not delivered by the expected date, saving time and money.

The logic of the utility is written from scratch in the PHP programming language. To ensure an attractive layout, Bootstrap along with its dependency javascript libraries Popper.js and jQuery were used on the front-end. Icons were sourced from Font Awesome. All of these libraries are published under a permissive license which allows their free use in other projects.

By default, the software should be installed as follows:

  1. Copy the "public" directory to where the web server expects public files, renaming it if necessary.
  2. Copy the accompanying "osm-modules" directory to the same directory as the "public" one - not inside it!
  3. Verify that the server has appropriate permissions to read itself, and write to a text file "osm_db.txt" in the same directory as the "public" and "osm_modules" directory.
